name: django-svelte-template
description: A modern full-stack template combining Django REST Framework with SvelteKit, featuring authentication, CRUD operations, and dark mode support

scripts.install: npm install && cd frontend && rm -f package-lock.json && npm install
scripts.dev:backend: source django_svelte_env/bin/activate && cd backend && python3 manage.py runserver
scripts.setup: npm run install && npm run setup:python
scripts.clean-install: cd frontend && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm install
scripts.setup:python: python3.12 -m venv django_svelte_env && source django_svelte_env/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.setup:python-win: python -m venv django_svelte_env && django_svelte_env\Scripts\activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.migrate: source django_svelte_env/bin/activate && cd backend && python3 manage.py migrate
scripts.migrate:win: django_svelte_env\Scripts\activate && cd backend && python manage.py migrate
scripts.createsuperuser: source django_svelte_env/bin/activate && cd backend && python3 manage.py createsuperuser
scripts.createsuperuser:win: django_svelte_env\Scripts\activate && cd backend && python manage.py createsuperuser
scripts.collectstatic: source django_svelte_env/bin/activate && cd backend && python3 manage.py collectstatic --noinput
scripts.collectstatic:win: django_svelte_env\Scripts\activate && cd backend && python manage.py collectstatic --noinput
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.format: npm run format:frontend && npm run format:backend
scripts.format:backend: source django_svelte_env/bin/activate && black backend/ && isort backend/
scripts.test:backend: source django_svelte_env/bin/activate && cd backend && python manage.py test
scripts.setup:dev: npm run setup && source django_svelte_env/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements-dev.txt

author: hingslim
